channel.title: Help with making safzones
channel.description: Ok I get how to do it basically but when it comes to the those codes like ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) I get the cords for the 4 corners and then where do I put the X and Y cords or do I only add X or Y instead of both eh lol Dunno if thats confusing probably is let me know if its to confusing to answer if it is either tell me or just point me to a noob friendly tut for safezone making :) thx guys!

@R4nge wrote:

yeah but do you add the X cords or Y or X in Abs X and Y in Abs Y
